dishes.name: Superboost Salad
dishes.description: A superfood mix of black rice, edamame beans, red quinoa, mung beans, hake, nuts, chickpeas, cranberries, peanuts, pumpkin seeds and egg with rocket, roasted red & yellow peppers, parsley and our light house dressing

dishes.name: Manzo Crocchette
dishes.description: Christmas special. Pulled beef and chianti crocchette served with rocket and a horseradish and crème fraiche dipping sauce

dishes.name: Terrina Festa
dishes.description: Christmas special. A soft terrine of salmon, crab and prawn, served with rocket, house dressing, a wedge of lemon, fresh parsley and flatbread

dishes.name: Risotto Fresco
dishes.description: Oak-roasted, peppered salmon fillet, garlic and fresh parsley in a creamy white wine risotto, with Gran Milano cheese, chopped fresh tomato and red onion: finished with a splash of chilli oil and a wedge of lemon

dishes.name: Bruschetta Originale 'PizzaExpress'
dishes.description: Our dough brushed with garlic butter and topped with chopped fresh tomato, red onion, fresh basil and pesto

dishes.name: Niçoise Salad
dishes.description: Our original 1985 recipe: tuna, anchovies, surfine capers, black olives, free-range egg, seasonal mixed leaves, fresh tomatoes and cucumber with house dressing and dough sticks

dishes.name: Pollo Pesto
dishes.description: Chicken, closed cup mushroom, red onion, mozzarella, Gran Milano cheese and pennette pasta in a béchamel and pesto sauce

dishes.name: Leggera Padana
dishes.description: Goat's cheese, caramelised onion, spinach, red onion, tomato and garlic oil

dishes.name: Calzone Classico
dishes.description: Folded pizza filled with Coppa, Finocchiona, Milano salami and pepperoni, light mozzarella, fresh tomatoes, fresh parsley, fresh basil, garlic oil, baby spinach, tomato and Gran Milano cheese with salad garnish and house dressing

dishes.name: Pollo Salad
dishes.description: Chicken, goat’s cheese, red pepper, fresh tomatoes, black olives and croutons with seasonal mixed leaves, house dressing and dough sticks

dishes.name: American Hot
dishes.description: Pepperoni, mozzarella and tomato, with your choice of hot green, Roquito or jalapeño peppers. Available as Classic or Romana

dishes.name: Melanzane al Forno
dishes.description: Marinated Italian aubergine, béchamel, mozzarella, fresh basil, garlic oil and tomato, finished with Gran Milano cheese (no pasta)

dishes.name: Lasagna Classica
dishes.description: Bolognese sauce, mushroom, tomato and béchamel sauce, finished with Gran Milano cheese

dishes.name: Soft Drink
dishes.description: 250 ml. soft drink of your choice: Schweppes, Coca Cola, Fanta or Sprite.

dishes.name: Spring Water
dishes.description: 200 ml. Biota spring water bottle

dishes.name: Non-alcoholic beer
dishes.description: 150 ml. Kralle 100% German alcohol-free beer

dishes.name: Mixed Salad
dishes.description: Seasonal mixed leaves, eggs, shrimps, fresh tomato, nuts and cucumber with our house dressing

dishes.name: Chocolate Brownie
dishes.description: Made using gluten-free flour, served with vanilla gelato, nuts, strawberry, fresh mint and icing sugar

dishes.name: Panettone Cheesecake
dishes.description: Christmas special. Chocolate chip and orange marmalade panettone pieces in a creamy vanilla cheesecake on a thick crumbly biscuit base, served with your choice of gelato, double cream or mascarpone

dishes.name: Snowball Dough Balls
dishes.description: Christmas special. Our famous Dough Balls with cinnamon and icing sugar and peanut sauce, served with a vanilla cream dip and a chocolate straw

dishes.name: Vanilla Cheesecake
dishes.description: Our New York-style vanilla cheesecake on a crumbly biscuit base, served with fruit coulis and your choice of cream, mascarpone or gelato

dishes.name: Chocolate Fudge Cake
dishes.description: Moist rich chocolate cake, baked in-house; served with your choice of cream, mascarpone or gelato

dishes.name: Chocolate Glory
dishes.description: Vanilla gelato, chocolate sauce, chunks of chocolate fudge cake and a chocolate straw

dishes.name: Caffé Reale
dishes.description: Figs in a cinnamon and white wine spiced syrup with mascarpone

dishes.name: Lemon Posset Crunch
dishes.description: A creamy lemon posset on a ginger biscuit base

dishes.name: Milk Cofee
dishes.description: Hot cofee latte with sugar or saccharine
